activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3800
activity.text:
I'm excited about this initiative, as I've already built an AI-powered development assistant that closely matches many of your requirements.

That app currently offers:

- Integration with 18 LLM providers and real-time streaming capabilities
- An enterprise-grade code generation pipeline with context-aware prompting
- A WebContainer-based execution environment for real-time code testing
- A high-performance chat interface for natural language interactions


With some focused enhancements, it can be adapted to:

- Integrate seamlessly with Beckn Protocol endpoints
- Implement visual state machine workflow editing
- Provide component palettes tailored for Beckn UI elements 

Further enhance the no-code experience for non-technical users
I believe leveraging my app as a foundation will accelerate development and ensure a robust, scalable solution. I’d love to contribute and collaborate on this project—happy to discuss how we can tailor the existing codebase to meet Beckn’s specific needs!

@viraj89 is there any communication channel where we can discuss this further?
